Hi {!Contact.FirstName} -
How's everything going? I have updated information for you on fuel price trends and your fleet card account.
The summer driving season hasn’t even begun and there are many that believe the gasoline markets may have already peaked. You can get more fuel price trend information from WEX online at http://www.wexinc.com/our-story/wex-index/.
I've attached your latest account review workbook along with some fuel price information for you.
These are the areas where your fleet card fueling data shows as cost savings opportunities or where you may already be sustaining cost avoidance:
Many are looking at putting GPS Telematics in their vehicles to track location, increase productivity & safety, and reduce fleet costs. Have you taken advantage of Section 179 this year? This low fuel price environment could be a great time to invest in these units and be able to write off the full cost in your 2016 taxes. WEX Telematics is fully integrated with your fuel data. Please let me know an okay time to discuss.
Section 179 Capital Purchase Tax Deduction http://www.section179.org/section_179_deduction.html
Thanks for being a WEX Customer.
Kind Regards,
